title.rendered: Official University of Johannesburg Prospectus 2024 – Download Now

content.rendered:
The University of Johannesburg consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and courses information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • Schools fees/tuitions
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • University of Johannesburg admission process.

Our prospectus outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at University of Johannesburg based on the information provided within it.

Note: University of Johannesburg’s prospectus is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives information about your application in greater detail.

University of Johannesburg Prospectus 2024

The University of Johannesburg   Prospectus is now available for download on the college’s official website, www.uj.ac.za/

University of Johannesburg PROSPECTUS 2024 – PDF DOWNLOAD
